main event: A witness observed a very bright, pinkish white object about the size of a basketball which disappeared behind clouds.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 10-15 minutes,The object was described as being very bright,There was insufficient information for a proper evaluation,The report selected various potential classifications for the object such as balloon or aircraft,There was only one confirmed witness to the sighting.
witness description: Details are too meager to permit a proper evaluation.
